Skill.label: ^1DO NOT LEVEL ROLLING MAGMA ON WITCH
^2Tip: Level Witch to level 4 to get these gems
^2You need to complete quest "Breaking some eggs"
^2You will need to complete quest "Mercy Mission"
^1^6Use this String to find early INT gear
^6^4"o in|nne" enter this in vendor search
Flame Wall (Shoot Magma Into wall for bonus dmg)
Holy Flame Totem (place behind your flame wall)
^5For rolling Magma try to aim infront of the mob.
Frostblink (You can use Arcane Surge here also)
Leap Slam (I use this till I go shield charge)
^4Level all gems to MAX level Except For
^5Lifetap - ^7This should only be maxed on RF & FT
^5Arcane Surge - ^7Keep low level for easy uptime
^1Do not forget to do Library Quest for Fire Trap!
^1You want to level Firetrap right away
^1RF can be acquired via Act II gem shop
^5Note: After completing Library you can switch to
Herald of Ash ^5(Replace With Purity in A3)
^2Tip: Drop Herald of Ash for Purity of Elements
^1This skill Section is assuming you are using RF
^0^1If you are stuck and can't run RF go to NOTES
Righteous Fire (You can replace Efficacy /w AoE)
^2At this stage I prefer running Shield Charge
Molten Shell (You can put on left click)
Frostblink (No need to level it up anymore)
Righteous Fire - In order of Importance
Frostblink - ^1Keep Lvl 1 or you die to Reflect
Frostblink - ^1Keep lvl 1 or you die to ele reflec
^2WoC is not needed if you have Exposure Gloves
^6If not using WoC you get 1 Extra Gem You can use
Frostblink - ^1Keep lvl 1 or you die to ele reflec
Molten Shell (Put this in your Unset Ring)

^2In this setup we switch RF To helm

Spec.title: Level 1-17 (Try to find Early INT Via Lapis Amulet)
Level 17-31 Running RF - Make sure your fire res is CAP & have Mastery allocated
Level 60-70 Getting ready for Tree Respec
Level 70-80 Entering Maps & Swapping to Malevolence.
Level 93 ^1More Expensive More Damage - Dropping Purity

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xE05030FOR LEVELING AS A CASTER MARAUDER YOU WILL NEED EARLY INTELIGENCE ^xADAA47Use this string in the vendors every time you go back to town "o in|nne" It will search for INT gear & MS boots. You can also purchase a LAPIS amulet starting at level 5 via Nessa
^1<<<<<<<<<<<<ALL YOU NEED TO RUN RF IS HAVE 75% FIRE RES & TAKE THE FIRE MASTERY FOR ^5REGEN 1 LIFE PER SECOND FOR EACH UNCAPPED FIRE RESISTANCE^4^1>>>>>>>>>>>>>^4
^xB97123To help Fire Res cap yourself in Act II don't forget about the Ruby Ring Recipe. Iron Ring + Red Gem = Ruby Ring
Also don't forget if you get stuck you can use my website for most info although it's geared mainly towards Inquisitor^7 --> ^x70FF70Pohx.net For players who want a more accurate set of gear progression feel free to follow my Progress on ^6Twitch.Tv/Pohx ^7OR use PoE Ninja to track my Progress ^6https://tinyurl.com/3zdew4r9
When dropping Purity of Elements in the Later gear swap here's what you do for Ailment Immunity ^4Freeze^6 = Brine King Pantheon (make sure to use the divine vessel to unlock it) ^4Chill ^6= 50% Reduced effect of Chill via the above pantheon ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ^4Shock^6 = Tempest Shield ^4Ignite ^6= You're an RF build please don't die to ignite friend (we do not get ignite immunity)
You lose Immunity to ^2Brittle, Sap & Scorch. ^6These are usually only found in Delirum/Altar/niche encounters
^7Here is a Mid/Late Game Gearing "Guide" to help you in the direction of what you want to use. Sponsored by phlyntv ^6 https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/980646391850360863/1034467004180082778/unknown.png ^7(AS A JUGG YOU Don't Need the Shaper Life Gain on Block Shield)
For Gearing you mainly want PURE Armour Pieces as a Jugg. However during the campaign I'd recommend getting a few Armour/ES or Pure ES pieces for the sake of easy colors. We use lots of blue gems in our build and it can be a pain to roll on Pure Armour in the early game.
Act 1: Vitality
Act 2: Vitality, Herald of Ash
Act 3: Vitality, Determination OR Purity of Elements.
^7Act 4: Vitality, Determination OR Purity of Elements ^4
^7Act 5: ^1Arrogance ^7Vitality, Determination, Purity of Elements. ^1Make Sure you put Vitality on Arrogance or this setup will not work.
^7Act 6-8 Same as Above ^
^7Act 9: ^1Arrogance ^7Vitality^7, Determination, Purity of Elements,^2 ^7
Act 10: ^1Arrogance ^7Vitality, Determination, Purity of Elements, ^2Skitterbot ^7
Sometime into Maps: ^1Arrogance ^7Vitality, Determination, Purity of Elements, ^5Malevolence ^7 ^4This will require you to take the Additional Mana reservation Master @ Deep Thoughts
Deep into the game: ^1Arrogance ^7Vitality, Determination, Malevolence, ^2Skitterbot, ^6Tempest Shield. ^4This will REQUIRE Charisma Anoint
^2^1For Players looking to add a bit of spice to the build, I'll throw in a couple of recommendations.
^2Energized Armour by templar spot (divine Judgement) Can give HUGE Sources of armour on "Faith & Steel" & "Sanctum of Thought" This in conjuction with the 10% Phys taken as Chaos mastery will be fantastic for mitigation Physical Damage
^5Glorious Vanity by Eternal Youth with Xibaqua Granting "Divine Flesh" can make you EXTREMELY Durable vs elemental damage. Pair this with the Arm/Es Mastery for Defend against chaos with 10% of your Armour
^7~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In the level 82+ Skill tree you'll have to make a decision on if you want to keep "Unyielding" or go "Unstoppable"
"Unyielding" = More Damage (prob like 10% overall) and very generous AoE for clear "Unstoppable" = More Faster, Stun Immune, Chill Immune, Feels much better overall but lower aoe
The reason I bring this up is because at 82+ I drop unwavering stance for some skill points so if you want to retain the stun immune you can go "unstoppable"
You also have a Pantheon Switch at this point. You swap between Brine King & Arakali based on what you are using (major only the minor never changed)
